## âš¡ï¸ SÃ¼rÉ™tli BaÅŸlanÄŸÄ±c

```go
package main

import "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Hello, World ğŸ‘‹!")
    })

    app.Listen(":3000")
}
```

Go dilinin `1.17` vÉ™ ya daha yuxarÄ± versiyasÄ±nÄ±n ([yÃ¼klÉ™mÉ™k Ã¼Ã§Ã¼n](https://go.dev/dl/)) yÃ¼klÉ™ndiyindÉ™n É™min olun.


Bir qovluq yaratdÄ±qdan sonra, `go mod init github.com/your/repo` ([go modullarÄ± haqqÄ±nda É™lavÉ™ bilgilÉ™r](https://go.dev/blog/using-go-modules)) komandasÄ±nÄ± eyni qovluÄŸun daxilindÉ™ iÅŸÉ™ salaraq proyektinizi baÅŸladÄ±n. NÃ¶vbÉ™ti addÄ±m olaraq Fiber'i [`go get`](https://pkg.go.dev/cmd/go/#hdr-Add_dependencies_to_current_module_and_install_them) komandasÄ±nÄ± iÅŸlÉ™dÉ™rÉ™k yÃ¼klÉ™yin:

```bash

```

## ğŸ’¡ FÉ™lsÉ™fÉ™

[Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/about/)'dÉ™n [Go](https://go.dev/doc/)'ya yeni keÃ§É™n gopher'lar veb aplikasiyalar vÉ™ mikroservislÉ™r yazmaÄŸa baÅŸlamadan Ã¶ncÉ™ dilin Ã¶zÃ¼nÉ™mÉ™xsus sintaksisini Ã¶yrÉ™nmÉ™klÉ™ mÉ™ÅŸÄŸul olurlar. Fiber, bir veb framework olaraq <b></b><b></b><b>Minimalizm</b> vÉ™ <b>UNIX'in yoluna</b> É™sasÉ™n vÉ™ onun qanunlarÄ±na riyaÉ™t edÉ™rÉ™k qurulmuÅŸdur. Bu sayÉ™dÉ™ sahÉ™dÉ™ yeni olan gopher'lÉ™r Ã¶zlÉ™rini isti vÉ™ gÃ¼vÉ™nilir bir xoÅŸ gÉ™ldin ilÉ™ Go dÃ¼nyasÄ±nda qarÅŸÄ±lana bilÉ™rlÉ™r.

Fiber, internet Ã¼zÉ™rindÉ™ olan É™n mÉ™ÅŸhur veb framework'lÉ™rdÉ™n biri olan Express'dÉ™n É™sinlÉ™nmiÅŸdir. Biz Express'in rahatlÄ±q vÉ™ asanlÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ±, Go'nun Ã§iy performansÄ± ilÉ™ birlÉ™ÅŸdirdik. ÆgÉ™r daha Ã¶ncÉ™dÉ™n Node.js Ã¼zÉ™rindÉ™ (Express vÉ™ ya bÉ™nzÉ™rlÉ™ri) veb aplikasiyasÄ± yaratdÄ±ysanÄ±z, É™ksÉ™r metodlar vÉ™ prinsiplÉ™ri sizÉ™ tanÄ±ÅŸ gÉ™lÉ™cÉ™kdir.

Biz istifadÉ™Ã§ilÉ™rdÉ™n gÉ™lÉ™n [issue'lara](https://github.com/gofiber/fiber/issues), Discord [kanalÄ±mÄ±za](https://gofiber.io/discord) vÉ™ bÃ¼tÃ¼n internetÉ™ sÃ¼rÉ™tli, rahat, hÉ™r tapÅŸÄ±rÄ±ÄŸa, hÉ™r sÉ™viyyÉ™dÉ™n olan mÃ¼hÉ™ndisÉ™ uyÄŸun, vÉ™ dostcasÄ±na bir Go web framework'Ã¼ olmaÄŸÄ± hÉ™dÉ™flÉ™miÅŸik. Express'in JavaScript dÃ¼nyasÄ±nda etdiyi kimi.

## âš ï¸ LimitlÉ™r
* Fiberin unsafe istifadÉ™si sÉ™bÉ™bilÉ™, hÉ™r zaman Go'nun son versiyasÄ± ile uyÄŸun olmaya bilÉ™r. Fiber 2.40.0, Go 1.17 vÉ™ 1.20 versiyalarÄ± ilÉ™ test edildi.
* Fiber net/http interfeyslÉ™ri ilÉ™ uyÄŸun deyildir. YÉ™ni gqlgen, go-swagger kimi net/http ekosisteminin parÃ§asÄ± olan proyektlÉ™ri istifadÉ™ edÉ™ bilmÉ™zsiniz.

## ğŸ‘€ Misallar

AÅŸaÄŸÄ±da geniÅŸ istifadÉ™ olunan misallardan bÉ™zilÉ™ri list halÄ±nda verilmiÅŸdir. ÆgÉ™r daha Ã§ox kod misallarÄ± gÃ¶rmÉ™k istÉ™yirsinizsÉ™ [ÆlavÉ™ misallardan ibarÉ™t github repository'sini](https://github.com/gofiber/recipes) vÉ™ ya [API dokumentasiyasÄ±nÄ±](https://docs.gofiber.io) ziyarÉ™t edin.

#### ğŸ“– [**SadÉ™ Routing**](https://docs.gofiber.io/#basic-routing)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/register
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ register
    })

    // GET /flights/LAX-SFO
    app.Get("/flights/:from-:to", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ’¸ From: %s, To: %s", c.Params("from"), c.Params("to"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ’¸ From: LAX, To: SFO
    })

    // GET /dictionary.txt
    app.Get("/:file.:ext", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ“ƒ %s.%s", c.Params("file"), c.Params("ext"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ“ƒ dictionary.txt
    })

    // GET /john/75
    app.Get("/:name/:age/:gender?", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("ğŸ‘´ %s is %s years old", c.Params("name"), c.Params("age"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => ğŸ‘´ john is 75 years old
    })

    // GET /john
    app.Get("/:name", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("Hello, %s ğŸ‘‹!", c.Params("name"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => Hello john ğŸ‘‹!
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**Route AdlandÄ±rÄ±lmasÄ±**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#name)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // GET /api/register
    app.Get("/api/*", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("âœ‹ %s", c.Params("*"))
        return c.SendString(msg) // => âœ‹ register
    }).Name("api")

    data, _ := json.MarshalIndent(app.GetRoute("api"), "", "  ")
    fmt.Print(string(data))
    // Prints:
    // {
    //    "method": "GET",
    //    "name": "api",
    //    "path": "/api/*",
    //    "params": [
    //      "*1"
    //    ]
    // }


    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**Static Fayl TÉ™qdimatÄ±**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#static)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/css/style.css

    app.Static("/prefix", "./public")
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/js/script.js
    // => http://localhost:3000/prefix/css/style.css

    app.Static("*", "./public/index.html")
    // => http://localhost:3000/any/path/shows/index/html

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

#### ğŸ“– [**Middleware & Next**](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#next)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // Match any route
    app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‡ First handler")
        return c.Next()
    })

    // Match all routes starting with /api
    app.Use("/api", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        fmt.Println("ğŸ¥ˆ Second handler")
        return c.Next()
    })

    // GET /api/list
    app.Get("/api/list", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        fmt.Println("ğŸ¥‰ Last handler")
        return c.SendString("Hello, World ğŸ‘‹!")
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}

```

<details>
  <summary>ğŸ“š Daha Ã§ox misalllar</summary>

### Views engines

ğŸ“– [Config](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/fiber#config)
ğŸ“– [Engines](https://github.com/gofiber/template)
ğŸ“– [Render](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#render)

Fiber defaults to the [html/template](https://pkg.go.dev/html/template/) when no view engine is set.

If you want to execute partials or use a different engine like [amber](https://github.com/eknkc/amber), [handlebars](https://github.com/aymerick/raymond), [mustache](https://github.com/cbroglie/mustache) or [pug](https://github.com/Joker/jade) etc..

Checkout our [Template](https://github.com/gofiber/template) package that support multiple view engines.

```go
package main

import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/template/pug"
)

func main() {
    // You can setup Views engine before initiation app:
    app := fiber.New(fiber.Config{
        Views: pug.New("./views", ".pug"),
    })

    // And now, you can call template `./views/home.pug` like this:
    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.Render("home", fiber.Map{
            "title": "Homepage",
            "year":  1999,
        })
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### Grouping routes into chains

ğŸ“– [Group](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/app#group)

```go
func middleware(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    fmt.Println("Don't mind me!")
    return c.Next()
}

func handler(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    return c.SendString(c.Path())
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    // Root API route
    api := app.Group("/api", middleware) // /api

    // API v1 routes
    v1 := api.Group("/v1", middleware) // /api/v1
    v1.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v1/list
    v1.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v1/user

    // API v2 routes
    v2 := api.Group("/v2", middleware) // /api/v2
    v2.Get("/list", handler)           // /api/v2/list
    v2.Get("/user", handler)           // /api/v2/user

    // ...
}

```

### Middleware logger

ğŸ“– [Logger](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/logger)

```go
package main

import (
    "log"

    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/logger"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(logger.New())

    // ...

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS)

ğŸ“– [CORS](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/cors)

```go
import (
    "log"

    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/cors"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(cors.New())

    // ...

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

Check CORS by passing any domain in `Origin` header:

```bash
curl -H "Origin: http://example.com" --verbose http://localhost:3000
```

### Custom 404 response

ğŸ“– [HTTP Methods](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#status)

```go
func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Static("/", "./public")

    app.Get("/demo", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("This is a demo!")
    })

    app.Post("/register", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendString("Welcome!")
    })

    // Last middleware to match anything
    app.Use(func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.SendStatus(404)
        // => 404 "Not Found"
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### JSON Response

ğŸ“– [JSON](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/ctx#json)

```go
type User struct {
    Name string `json:"name"`
    Age  int    `json:"age"`
}

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Get("/user", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(&User{"John", 20})
        // => {"name":"John", "age":20}
    })

    app.Get("/json", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        return c.JSON(fiber.Map{
            "success": true,
            "message": "Hi John!",
        })
        // => {"success":true, "message":"Hi John!"}
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### WebSocket Upgrade

ğŸ“– [Websocket](https://github.com/gofiber/websocket)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/websocket"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/ws", websocket.New(func(c *websocket.Conn) {
    for {
      mt, msg, err := c.ReadMessage()
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("read:", err)
        break
      }
      log.Printf("recv: %s", msg)
      err = c.WriteMessage(mt, msg)
      if err != nil {
        log.Println("write:", err)
        break
      }
    }
  }))

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
  // ws://localhost:3000/ws
}
```

### Server-Sent Events

ğŸ“– [More Info](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Server-sent_events/Using_server-sent_events)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/valyala/fasthttp"
)

func main() {
  app := fiber.New()

  app.Get("/sse", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
    c.Set("Content-Type", "text/event-stream")
    c.Set("Cache-Control", "no-cache")
    c.Set("Connection", "keep-alive")
    c.Set("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked")

    c.Context().SetBodyStreamWriter(fasthttp.StreamWriter(func(w *bufio.Writer) {
      fmt.Println("WRITER")
      var i int

      for {
        i++
        msg := fmt.Sprintf("%d - the time is %v", i, time.Now())
        fmt.Fprintf(w, "data: Message: %s\n\n", msg)
        fmt.Println(msg)

        w.Flush()
        time.Sleep(5 * time.Second)
      }
    }))

    return nil
  })

  log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

### Recover middleware

ğŸ“– [Recover](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/middleware/recover)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/recover"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New()

    app.Use(recover.New())

    app.Get("/", func(c *fiber.Ctx) error {
        panic("normally this would crash your app")
    })

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

</details>

### GÃ¼vÉ™nilir Proxy Ä°stifadÉ™si

ğŸ“– [Config](https://docs.gofiber.io/api/fiber#config)

```go
import (
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2"
    "github.com/gofiber/fiber/v2/middleware/recover"
)

func main() {
    app := fiber.New(fiber.Config{
        EnableTrustedProxyCheck: true,
        TrustedProxies: []string{"0.0.0.0", "1.1.1.1/30"}, // IP address or IP address range
        ProxyHeader: fiber.HeaderXForwardedFor},
    })

    // ...

    log.Fatal(app.Listen(":3000"))
}
```

</details>
